item.extendomerald.emerald_shard.tooltip: §7 We'll need more than this to make something useful.
item.extendomerald.emerald_clump.tooltip: §7 A clump of emerald that can be hardened with heat.
item.extendomerald.sharpened_emerald.too: §7 A sharpened emerald. It's sharp enough to cut through anything.
item.extendomerald.hardened_emerald.tool: §7 A hardened emerald. It's tough enough to be used as a tool.
§7 To do so, you need to sharpen it first using a stonecutter.
